settings.heading: HOW IT WORKS
settings.content:
• Works together with Yates MD thickening shampoo to complement your treatment plan and enhance results
  • Makes thinning hair look thicker using a special formula designed by hair loss experts
  • Supports healthy hair growth with natural, science-backed ingredients like biotin, caffeine, green tea, and saw palmetto

settings.heading: ABOUT THIS TREATMENT
settings.accordion_INFO: Thickening CONDITIONER (kuhn • DISH • uh • ner) is specially formulated to strengthen the cuticle layer of your scalp, which encourages healthy hair growth and keeps your existing hair smooth and manageable. It does not treat or stop hair loss. It is not clinically proven to improve hair growth.

settings.text_quiz: Not sure if this treatment is right for you?

settings.accordion_p:
Essential for Protein Digestion

A natural substance that provides a crucial step in building hair and skin proteins such as collagen.

Antioxidant Synthesis

Sulfur, the main ingredient in MSM, is vital for generating hair cartilage, and collagen in the skin.

Hormone Health Support

Provides essential fatty acids and phytosterols supporting hair follicle development and glowing skin.

Keratin Production & Follicle Growth

Too much Biotin can lead to unwanted breakouts. Wellbel Women contains 500mcg compared to 3,000-10,000 mcg in other supplements.

settings.heading_text: Using only what's needed—vegan, effective ingredients sourced just for you.

settings.title: Month 1+
settings.text: Consistency is key. Take 3 vegan capsules once daily to nourish your hair, naturally. Some daily users report visible results within 90 days.

settings.title: Month 2+
settings.text: Let the ingredients do their thing. You may start noticing some results and improved hair health.

settings.title: Month 3+
settings.text: It's your time to shine! Hair may look visibly healthier and thicker. You may notice shedding has stabilized.

settings.title: Month 4+
settings.text: A moment of growth. Continued benefits of fuller, shinier and healthier hair.

settings.title: Get unmatched results
settings.title_p: Reach your hair goals by making Wellbel a consistent daily ritual.

settings.checkbox_text: 90-day money back guarantee

settings.label_text: Does Wellbel work for all hair types?
settings.description_text: Yes. The key ingredients were formulated to work with all hair types and textures from 1a-4c for adults (18 and above).

Wellbel has been formulated with 500 mcg (compared to 2,500-10,000 in other supplements) of biotin to help prevent breakouts and rashes. Our mission is to use the right dosing of the highest quality ingredients to support beautiful skin.

settings.label_text: Will Wellbel Women cause hair to grow in places other than my head?
settings.description_text: Wellbel Women was formulated to support healthy hair where it thins. We have heard from members of our community that they have noticed growth and thickness in their eyebrows and eyelashes while using Wellbel.

settings.label_text: Is Wellbel Women suitable for women who are pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.description_text: We don't suggest taking any supplements when you are pregnant or breastfeeding unless directed by your healthcare provider.

settings.label_text: Does Wellbel Women equally help skin, and nails as much as hair?
settings.description_text: Absolutely. Wellbel provides a proper balance of essential vitamins, minerals, and phytonutrients to equally support healthy hair, skin, and nails.

settings.label_text: Can Wellbel Women be taken if you have done laser hair removal?
settings.description_text: We have not heard any negative feedback from our community regarding Wellbel and laser hair removal.

settings.title: Why Yates MD?
settings.info:
2 out of 3 guys will experience hair loss by the age of 35. There is no magic cure for baldness but you can prevent hair loss from happening in the first place. Take action today with our scientific and affordable approach.

  • Less than you’d pay at your local pharmacy
  • Clinically-proven treatments and science-backed formulas
  • Free consultation to ensure your treatment plan is right for you
  • Ongoing support and guidance from a licensed medical provider
  • Shipped and delivered directly to your door

settings.Subtitle: 1. Pick your plan
settings.info: Pick the clinically-proven treatment that's right for you. A licensed doctor will confirm it's everything you need.

settings.Subtitle: 2. Get it delivered
settings.info: Your Yates MD treatment arrives at your door every three, six, or twelve months—at a fraction of the cost of your local pharmacy.

settings.Subtitle: 3. Keep your hair
settings.info: Easily track progress as you experience less hair loss and hair regrowth. Adjust, pause, or cancel your plan at any time.

settings.description_text: For the majority of men, hair loss is caused by a genetic condition called androgenetic alopecia (also known as male pattern baldness). Male pattern baldness accounts for more than 95% of hair loss in men. In some cases, hair loss can be a sign of a more serious medical condition or nutritional deficiency. It is important to consult with a licensed medical professional about any significant hair loss to determine the cause and identify an appropriate solution.

settings.label_text: What is the best medical treatment for hair loss?
settings.description_text: Hair loss caused by male pattern baldness can be treated with two safe and effective formulas—finasteride and minoxidil—which are FDA-approved to treat hair loss. Depending on your condition, your medical provider may recommend one or both treatment options. Some studies indicate that taking finasteride and minoxidil in tandem may be the most effective way to combat hair loss. A Keeps physician can help determine which treatment plan is right for you through a quick consultation.

More than 95% of hair loss in men is caused by a genetic condition called androgenetic alopecia (AKA male pattern baldness). Currently, there is no known cure for male pattern baldness, but there are two FDA-approved treatments that are clinically proven to combat the symptoms of male pattern baldness by preventing hair loss and improving hair regrowth.

settings.label_text: Can I use insurance to pay for Yates MD?
settings.description_text: While our treatments are not covered under insurance, our products are available at a fraction of the cost of traditional pharmacies and retailers. We’re dedicated to making it easy and affordable to treat hair loss, which is why many of our treatment plans cost as low as $10/month.
